column4: "Dɛm ntsi na m'adwen yɛ me dɛ mumbua wo

column3: Na me ntseasee hyɛ me tsipia dɛ mumbua."

column2: "Ana ɔwo innyim iyi a ofi tsetseberdo
column3: Ofitsi dɛ wɔdze nyimpa too asaase do no
Na ne tsir kɛka mununkum mpo a;"

column2: "Ɔbɛsɛɛ korakora dɛ nankasa n'egyanan. Hɔn a woehu no no bebisa dɛ
column3: Ɔwɔ hen?"
na worunnhu no
column5: wobetsiw no dɛ anadwe enyido adzehu."

column2: "Enyiwa a ohun no no runnhu no bio; Nkyii so ne tsenabew runnhu no bio."

column3: Na ne nsa eyi n'ahonyadze asan ama."

column2: "Ne mberantsɛber mu ahoɔdzen hyɛɛ ne mbiew amaama. Na mbom ɔnye no bɛda wɔ huntuma mu."

column3: Na ɔdze suma ne tɛkyerɛma ase;"
na oenngyaa mu ma ɔannkɔ
column4: Na mbom ɔkɔ do ara sie no wɔ n'adadaw mu mpo a;"

column3: Na ɔbɛyɛ nhurutsia bɔwema wɔ no mu."
naaso ɔbɛfe egu: Nyankopɔn beyi efi ne yamu akyen."

column2: "Obohwiew nhurutsia bɔr: Na ɔpambir tɛkyerɛma boku no."

column3: Ewo na buter nsupemee no."
ɔbɛdan ama
column4: na ɔnnkɛmen: Na onnkedzi n'eguadzi mu mfaso ho ehurusi."

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔatseetsee ehiafo na ɔapow hɔn; Na ɔdze enyimpi afa fie bi a nnyɛ ɔno na osii."
"Ɔnam dɛ oennhu n'akɔndɔ mu mee ntsi
column3: Ɔronnkora dza n'enyigye wɔ mu mu biribiara do."
Dɛm ntsi n'eyiedzi nnketsim."
no ho behiahia no: Amandzehu yaayaw bodwir no do."
Nyankopɔn bohue n'ebufuhyew no egu no do
column4: Na ɔatɔ ekutuku dɛ nsu wɔ no do."

column3: Na boran egyen abɔ no ehwira mu."
na ofi ne nyimpadua mu pue: Nyew
column4: n'ano dɛhyɛdɛhyɛ no fi no bɔwema mu pue; Ihu ho nketsenketse kyekyer no."

column2: "Sum nyinara wɔdze esie ama n'akoradze: Gya a nyimpa bi nnhuta na ɔbɛmen no; Ɔbɛhyew dza aka wɔ n'asesee mu."

column3: Na asaase bɔsoɛr etsia no."
N'adze bɛpem akɔ wɔ n'ebufuw da no mu."

column2: "Iyi nye nyimpa dzebɔnyɛnyi ne kyɛfa a ofi Nyankopɔn hɔ
column3: Na egyapadze a Nyankopɔn ahyɛ ama no."
